amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: \ SEC. __. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used by the Council of Economic Advisers to produce an Economic Report of the President regarding the inclusion of employment at a retail fast food restaurant as part of the definition of manufacturing employment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that none of the funds made available in the bill may be used by the Council of Economic Advisers to produce an Economics Report of the President regarding the inclusion of employment at a retail fast food restaurant as part of the definition of manufacturing employment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (OH) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Brown (OH).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brown (OH) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
